        @Deprecated
void setKillTrigger(@NotNull
                                 org.bukkit.entity.Player killer,
                                 @Nullable
                                 java.util.function.Consumer<org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity> trigger)
        Deprecated. 

        The trigger executes when the given Player kills a LivingEntity.

        Parameters:
        killer - is the only player binded to this trigger.
        trigger - The trigger that you want to add.Pass null to this parameter if you want to remove the previous one.
        See Also:
        trigger, Player, LivingEntity

      • setDeathTrigger

        @Deprecated
void setDeathTrigger(@NotNull
                                  org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                  boolean respawn,
                                  @Nullable
                                  java.lang.Runnable trigger)
        Deprecated. 

        The trigger executes right after the given player dies.

        Parameters:
        player - This player is the only one binded to the trigger
        respawn - Determines whether or not the player will respawn.
        trigger - The trigger that you want to add.Pass null to this parameter if you want to remove the previous one.
        See Also:
        trigger, player
